snippet.title: Assumption of Mary - Dr. Miravalle: Mcasts167
snippet.description:
Assumption of Mary - Dr. Miravalle: Mcasts167
Toegevoegd door AirMaria vorig jaar
On this Solemnity of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary Dr. Mark Miravalle relates the dogma of the Assumption to the other dogmas regarding Our Lady, namely her Divine Maternity, Perpetual Virginity and her Immaculate Conception and then how all these relate to another doctrine that is not yet proclaimed a dogma, namely her Spiritual Maternity of All People. To ask questions regarding Mary, email Dr Mark Miravalle: marycast@airmaria.com Ave Maria! To Download Audio go to http://airmaria.com?p=29916
8 views

snippet.title: Cathedral Basilica of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary, in Lviv (Ukraine)
snippet.description:
Cathedral Basilica of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary, in Lviv (Ukraine)
Toegevoegd door Grzegorz Dymon 2 jaren geleden
Unfortunately, the lady who recorded this video had no imagination at all and at some point simply holding the phone as she liked. I can't do anything with that, although heart hurts me terribly that this video was so bad ;( but I throw, so you could look at the Lviv Cathedral Basilica (Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary) and listen to the sounds of local pipe organ :)
48 views

snippet.title: Cathedral of Saint Mary of the Assumption - 3D laser crystal engraved model
snippet.description:
Cathedral of Saint Mary of the Assumption - 3D laser crystal engraved model
Toegevoegd door Ucrystal 3 jaren geleden
http://www.ucrystal.com. The Cathedral of Saint Mary of the Assumption is a structural masterpiece and a well-known landmark in San Francisco. The roof was such designed that it curves up from a square base to form a cross on the top. Based on some photos, a 3D model was constructed and laser engraved into 3D crystals. The 3D laser crystal engraving utilizes green semiconductor laser to form the image inside the crystals while keeping the surface unchanged. The laser engraved 3D model can be viewed from all directions. This video shows a 360 degree view of the magnificent building.
211 views

snippet.title: Aug 15 - Homily: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary
snippet.description:
Aug 15 - Homily: The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary
Toegevoegd door AirMaria 2 jaren geleden
On this Solemnity of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary, Fr. Bonaventure encourages us to be strengthened in the virtue of hope by this great gift bestowed upon Her, and to seek the true joys of heaven, not the false joys in the world. Ave Maria! Mass: Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary - Solemnity - Form: OF Readings: 1st: rev 11:19, 12 1-6, 10 R: psa 45:10, 11, 12, 16 2nd: 1co 15:20-26 Gsp: luk 1:39-56 Audio (MP3) To Download Audio go to http://airmaria.com?p=21208
52 views

snippet.title: Aug 15 - Homily: Assumption of Mary and Queenship
snippet.description:
Aug 15 - Homily: Assumption of Mary and Queenship
Toegevoegd door AirMaria 3 jaren geleden
Today we celebrate the Solemnity of the Assumption of Mary, body and soul into Heaven and Fr. Bonaventure preaches on the connection between Mary's prerogatives to the Kingship of Christ and so relates her dignity to his, her Queenship to his Kingship , His Ascension to to her Assumption. All granted by one and the same decree of predestination revealed by Paul in Eph 1:3-10. And given this connection between Mary, the New Eve, and Jesus, the New Adam, Father stresses the connection of upholding the honor of Our Lady with the general defense of Christianity against secularism and atheism. Ave Maria! Readings: 1: Rev 11:19; 12:1-6,10 R: Ps 45:10-12,16 2: 1 Cor 15:20-27 G: Lk 1:39-56 To Download Audio go to http://airmaria.com?p=14200
53 views

snippet.title: Aug 15 - Homily: Assumption of Mary
snippet.description:
Aug 15 - Homily: Assumption of Mary
Toegevoegd door AirMaria 4 jaren geleden
In this event of the Assumption of Mary into heaven both body and soul, which we memorialize today, we honor all the virtues and events in Our Lady's life that was so closely intertwined with Our Lord, her Son. Fr. Bonaventure relates this to the dignity of the human body which was created by God to give Him glory. Ave Maria! To Download Audio go to http://airmaria.com?p=6429
500 views

snippet.title: Aug 15 Homily: The Assumption of Mary
snippet.description:
Aug 15 Homily: The Assumption of Mary
Toegevoegd door AirMaria 5 jaren geleden
Sin did not touch her personally, but it touched her in a way that no other human soul has been touched in the history of the world - by way of Compassion and so today she receives the Crown of her reward. Ave Maria!
71 views

snippet.title: Role of Assumptions in Economics : Economics Homework Help by Classof1.com
snippet.description:
Role of Assumptions in Economics : Economics Homework Help by Classof1.com
Toegevoegd door Homework Help laatste juli
Visit http://classof1.com/homework-help/economics-homework-help/ for customized academic assistance in Economics. Role of Assumptions in Economics : If you ask a physicist how long it would take for a marble to fall from the top of a ten-story building, she will answer the question by assuming that the marble falls in a vacuum. Of course, this assumption is false. In fact, the building is surrounded by air, which exerts friction on the falling marble and slows it down.
